content.description: There are a couple of small, sharp holds that lead to a big nasty razor pit hold in the crack. From there, make one more move to a topout.Stand start on ground. Left hand on the good side pull, right on a good undercling. Rock slab is off. Move up and right to the arete. Find Bandaids.An alternate stand start:Use the mono Sarlacc pit hold for your left hand and the nub in the seam to stand up on a precarious foot, and go big for the razor blade pit hold.

Sarlacc Pit Boulder is a funky looking boulder with a couple routes. There is a mono hold with teeth on the inside that kinda feels and looks like a mini-sarlacc pit/mouth. There is a also a hold with what feels like putting your hand in the mouth of a shark.
